snippet: Triple world champion Lewis Hamilton has taken inspiration from U.S. tennis great Serena Williams as he prepares for a Formula One title showdown with Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg this weekend....
lead_paragraph: Triple world champion Lewis Hamilton has taken inspiration from U.S. tennis great Serena Williams as he prepares for a Formula One title showdown with Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg this weekend.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Takes Inspiration From Williams Sisters
headline.main: Hamilton Takes Inspiration From Williams Sisters
